Quran Tracker Premium.name: Quran Tracker Premium
Quran Tracker Premium.description: Track Quran recitation, memorization & Tafsir in one powerful Notion template. Stay motivated, reflect deeply, and elevate your Quran journey.

90-Day Challenge Premium.name: 90-Day Challenge Premium
90-Day Challenge Premium.description: Transform your habits in 90 days with this Notion template! Track progress, stay motivated, and build better routines with ease.

Priority Compass.name: Priority Compass
Priority Compass.description: Master your time and boost your productivity with the Priority Compass, a clean and powerful Notion template inspired by the Eisenhower Matrix. This system helps you identify what truly matters and act on it effectively.

TaskMaster.name: TaskMaster
TaskMaster.description: Stay on top of your tasks with this powerful Notion template designed for seamless organization and productivity. Whether you're managing daily tasks, weekly plans, or long-term goals, TaskMaster keeps everything in one place.

Ibadat Tracker.name: Ibadat Tracker
Ibadat Tracker.description: Track your daily worship, earn badges, and stay motivated with the Ibadat Tracker Notion template. Stay consistent and elevate your spiritual journey.

Quran Tracker.name: Quran Tracker
Quran Tracker.description: Track Quran recitation, memorization & Tafsir in one powerful Notion template. Stay motivated, reflect deeply, and elevate your Quran journey.

Study Planner.name: Study Planner
Study Planner.description: Stay organized and on track with the Minimalist Study Planner! Manage courses, track progress, and meet deadlines with this clean, customizable Notion template.

Weekly Planner.name: Weekly Planner
Weekly Planner.description: Plan and prioritize your week with the Minimalist Weekly Planner! Stay organized, hit deadlines, and maximize productivity with this clean Notion template.

Habit Tracker.name: Habit Tracker
Habit Tracker.description: Track and build habits with the Minimalist Habit Tracker! Stay consistent, visualize progress, and achieve your goals with this simple, customizable Notion template.

Reading Tracker.name: Reading Tracker
Reading Tracker.description: Track your reading journey with the Minimalist Book Tracker! Stay organized, monitor progress, and capture insights in a clean, distraction-free Notion template.

90-Day Challenge.name: 90-Day Challenge
90-Day Challenge.description: Transform your habits in 90 days with this Notion template! Track progress, stay motivated, and build better routines with ease.

Quran Memorization.name: Quran Memorization
Quran Memorization.description: Master Quran memorization with the Five Fortresses method! Track progress, stay accountable, and boost retention with this structured Notion template.

Ramadan Tracker.name: Ramadan Tracker
Ramadan Tracker.description: Track your Ramadan experience with this useful Notion template. Stay motivated, stay organized, and reflect on your journey during this blessed month.

Notion Starter Pack.name: Notion Starter Pack
Notion Starter Pack.description: Get started with Notion using this handpicked collection of free, beginner-friendly templates created by Mostafa Yasser — a Notion expert and productivity creator. This Starter Pack includes essential tools to help you plan, track, and stay productive in your daily life.

Idea Flow - Team Edition.name: Idea Flow - Team Edition
Idea Flow - Team Edition.description: Elevate your team’s productivity with Idea Flow – Team Edition, a powerful Notion template designed to streamline collaborative idea management. This all-in-one system transforms raw concepts into successful outcomes by fostering discussion, enabling informed decisions, and ensuring seamless execution. Built for clarity and collaboration, it empowers teams to stay aligned and focused.

homeSec.title: Master your student life with StudyHub
homeSec.description: the all-in-one Notion template for tracking everything from classes and tasks to habits and goals.

dashboardSec.title: Your Entire Student Life in One View
dashboardSec.description: Explore how StudyHub brings everything together in one smart dashboard.

essentialsSec.title: Everything You Need — In One Place
essentialsSec.description: Discover the core features that make StudyHub your ultimate academic companion.

0.title: Dashboard Overview
0.description: A sleek central hub that summarizes your academic life: progress, weekly schedule, and quick actions.

1.title: Schedule Section
1.description: Plan your week with a clear and organized breakdown of your daily classes.

2.title: Quick Actions Panel
2.description: Easily add new lessons, instructors, notes, or goals with a single click.

3.title: Progress Tracker
3.description: Automatically updated analytics to help you measure academic performance over time.

4.title: Learning Hub
4.description: Manage all your current and upcoming courses in one smart space.

5.title: To-Do Hub
5.description: Stay on top of your tasks, assignments, and exams with smart date filters like Today, Upcoming, and Missed.

6.title: Review Hub
6.description: Keep all your learning resources and notes organized for easy access and review.

7.title: Reading Side
7.description: Track your current reads and monitor completion rates to stay consistent with your learning goals.

8.title: Flow Section
8.description: Build daily consistency through habit tracking and journaling.

9.title: Mission Hub
9.description: Set long-term academic goals and follow your progress toward achieving them.

10.title: Monthly View
10.description: A calendar view that brings together your exams, tasks, notes, and events all in one place.

11.title: Pre-built Databases
11.description: A modular system with dedicated databases for courses, tasks, exams, instructors, resources, notes, and more.

walkthroughSec.title: A Visual Walkthrough of StudyHub
walkthroughSec.description: Take a closer look at how StudyHub helps you manage your academic life — from planning and studying to tracking progress and setting goals.

0.title: Organize What You Study & When You Study
0.description: View all your courses alongside your weekly schedule. Stay on track with what you're learning and exactly when you need to focus on it — all in one smart layout.

1.title: Structured Learning from Modules to Lessons
1.description: Break down your courses into clear modules and lessons. Easily track what you've covered and what's next — no more scattered materials or missed topics.

2.title: Stay Ahead of Every Deadline
2.description: Track all your assignments, tasks, and exams in one place. With smart filters and reminders, you'll never miss an important date again.

3.title: Read, Capture, and Explore
3.description: Access your reading list, study notes, and valuable resources — all in one place. StudyHub keeps your knowledge organized, searchable, and always at your fingertips.

4.title: Set Goals. Build Projects. Make Progress.
4.description: Turn your academic vision into action. Track long-term goals and manage projects with clear steps, deadlines, and progress indicators.

firstOne.title: Everything About Your Course — In One Place
firstOne.description: Click into any course to access all related tasks, exams, notes, resources, and more. StudyHub connects every detail so you can focus on learning, not searching.

secondOne.title: Track Your Progress Like Never Before
secondOne.description: Get a complete overview of your academic and personal growth — from finished courses and assignments to achieved goals and habits. Stay motivated with real-time progress insights.

databasesSec.title: The Backbone of StudyHub
databasesSec.description: At the heart of StudyHub is a powerful system of interconnected databases designed to organize, connect, and simplify your entire academic journey.

0.title: Courses
0.description: Organize all your academic courses in one place — each with linked lessons, tasks, notes, and progress.

1.title: Modules
1.description: Break down each course into structured modules or units for easier navigation and focused learning.

2.title: Lessons
2.description: Track individual lessons, their topics, progress, and related materials — all connected to your modules and courses.

3.title: Assignments
3.description: Stay on top of every assignment, due date, and submission with smart filters and priority tags.

4.title: Exams
4.description: Plan and prepare for upcoming quizzes, midterms, and finals — with space for dates, study material, and linked courses.

5.title: Instructors
5.description: Manage details for all your professors and instructors, including contact info and courses they teach.

6.title: Schedule
6.description: Visualize your weekly timetable — classes, sessions, and events all organized and easy to access.

7.title: Notes
7.description: Capture and organize your study notes, ideas, and summaries — linked to lessons and courses.

8.title: Resources
8.description: Store useful materials like PDFs, links, and videos, categorized and tagged for easy access.

9.title: Flow
9.description: Build daily consistency with integrated Habits and Journaling — boost focus and self-reflection.

10.title: Books
10.description: Track your current and past readings, with progress bars, categories, and personal ratings.

11.title: Archive
11.description: Move completed courses, lessons, and tasks here to keep your workspace clean and focused.

12.title: Goals
12.description: Define academic and personal goals, track progress, and break them into actionable steps.

13.title: Projects
13.description: Manage long-term assignments, research, or capstone projects — with status, deadlines, and subtasks.

14.title: Tasks
14.description: All your to-dos in one place — assignments, reviews, chores, and more, with flexible filters and views.

pricingSec.title: Choose Your Plan
pricingSec.description: Two options. Same goal: your academic success.

basic.label: Basic
basic.description: A free, simplified version to get you started.

advanced.label: Advanced
advanced.description: Unlock your full academic productivity potential.

faqs.question: What is Notion?
faqs.answer: Notion is your all-in-one digital workspace — a second brain where you can organize notes, tasks, courses, goals, and everything in between.

faqs.question: How do I get access to the template?
faqs.answer: Once you complete your purchase, you'll instantly receive an email with a link to duplicate the StudyHub template to your Notion workspace.

faqs.question: Do I need a paid Notion account?
faqs.answer: No. You can use StudyHub with Notion’s free plan.

faqs.question: Will I know how to use it?
faqs.answer: Yes. It comes with detailed video tutorials and in-system written guidance to walk you through everything step-by-step.

faqs.question: Is it worth the price?
faqs.answer: Definitely. You save hours building from scratch and get a professionally designed academic dashboard ready to use immediately.

faqs.question: What is your refund policy?
faqs.answer: You can request a refund within 14 days of purchase following the Marketplace refund policy.

faqs.question: Still have questions?
faqs.answer: Email me at contact@mostafayasser.com or DM me on Twitter anytime.

Idea Flow - Solo Edition.name: Idea Flow - Solo Edition
Idea Flow - Solo Edition.description: Transform your ideas into actionable outcomes with Idea Flow – Solo Edition, the ultimate all-in-one system for managing and organizing your personal ideas. Designed for simplicity and clarity, this Notion template ensures no idea gets lost by guiding you through structured stages—from raw thoughts to completed projects.

Notion Me.name: Notion ME
Notion Me.description: Create a professional personal homepage using Notion. Notion Me is a clean, elegant template designed for creators, freelancers, and professionals who want to showcase their identity, services, and latest work — all in one place.

homeSec.title: Master your life with Second Brain
homeSec.description: The all-in-one Notion system to organize your tasks, goals, habits, ideas, and finances — all in one connected workspace

dashboardSec.title: Your Entire Life in One View
dashboardSec.description: Explore how Second Brain brings your goals, tasks, habits, and finances together in one powerful dashboard.

essentialsSec.title: Everything You Need — In One Place
essentialsSec.description: Discover the core features that make Second Brain your ultimate system for life, work, and finances.

0.title: Profile (Total Progress)
0.description: Visual overview of your total progress across goals, tasks, projects, habits, and finances in one centralized hub.

1.title: Areas (Life Areas)
1.description: Organize your life into domains (e.g., study, health, finance) with linked goals, projects, and financial tracking.

2.title: Goals
2.description: Track your long-term objectives with progress bars, deadlines, and direct links to your areas and projects.

3.title: Projects
3.description: Manage time-bound initiatives with milestone tracking, task links, visual progress indicators, and deadlines.

4.title: Tasks
4.description: Handle your daily and weekly to-dos with status tracking, overdue alerts, and connections to projects and goals.

5.title: Ideas
5.description: Capture and organize your inspirations, with the ability to pin or convert them into actionable tasks or projects.

6.title: Notes
6.description: Build a personal knowledge base with organized, searchable notes categorized by time and relevance.

7.title: Resources
7.description: Store and categorize reference materials, articles, and educational content with tags and importance levels.

8.title: Books
8.description: Track your reading progress with page tracking, completion rates, cover images, and personal notes.

9.title: Watchlist
9.description: Manage your movies, series, and courses with viewing status, categories, and direct source links.

10.title: Contacts
10.description: Store personal and professional contacts, including notes, interaction history, and categorization.

11.title: Habits
11.description: Build consistency by tracking your daily and weekly habits with visual progress and completion rates.

12.title: Journalling
12.description: Reflect daily with mood tracking, prompts, and archival systems for deeper self-awareness.

13.title: Archive
13.description: Keep your workspace clean by archiving completed or inactive tasks, notes, and projects for future reference.

walkthroughSec.title: A Visual Walkthrough of Second Brain
walkthroughSec.description: Take a closer look at how Second Brain helps you manage your entire life — from organizing tasks and goals to tracking habits, ideas, and finances.

0.title: From Vision to Action
0.description: Define your life areas, set meaningful goals, manage projects, and complete tasks — all in one connected workflow.

1.title: Recurring Tasks Made Easy
1.description: Automate your workflow with flexible repeat options — daily, weekly, monthly, or fully custom.

2.title: Review Hub
2.description: Revisit your notes and resources with spaced repetition — stay sharp and never forget what matters.

3.title: Idea Engine
3.description: Capture, summarize, and instantly turn ideas into actionable tasks or projects — powered by AI.

4.title: Wellness Flow
4.description: Track your habits, reflect through journaling, and monitor your mood — all in one mindful space.

5.title: Control Center
5.description: Visualize your total progress across goals, projects, and tasks — with detailed breakdowns for each objective.

firstOne.title: Connected Clarity
firstOne.description: Open any goal or project and instantly see all related tasks, notes, resources, ideas, and progress — all in one place.

secondOne.title: Visual Insights
secondOne.description: Explore charts and analytics across all your Second Brain — from reading and habits to goals, projects, mood, tasks, and more.

databasesSec.title: The Backbone of Second Brain
databasesSec.description: At the core of Second Brain lies a powerful network of interconnected databases — built to organize, connect, and simplify every part of your personal, professional, and financial life.

0.title: Profile
0.description: Your personal dashboard for tracking progress across all areas — goals, tasks, projects, and more.

1.title: Areas
1.description: Break your life into focus zones (e.g., Health, Career, Finance) — each with linked goals and dedicated projects.

2.title: Goals
2.description: Define your long-term objectives and stay motivated with visual progress bars, deadlines, and linked actions.

3.title: Projects
3.description: Manage multi-step initiatives with milestone tracking, linked tasks, and status-based organization.

4.title: Tasks
4.description: Handle your day-to-day to-dos with smart filters, deadline alerts, and direct links to projects and goals.

5.title: Ideas
5.description: Capture sparks of inspiration and turn them into actionable tasks or full-fledged projects when you're ready.

6.title: Notes
6.description: Build your personal knowledge base with searchable notes, sorted by time and category.

7.title: Resources
7.description: Organize articles, videos, and references — all categorized by type, importance, or relevance.

8.title: Books
8.description: Track your reading journey with completion rates, page tracking, and space for personal insights.

9.title: Watchlist
9.description: Keep a log of movies, series, and courses you want to watch, with viewing status and source links.

10.title: Contacts
10.description: Maintain important personal and professional connections with notes and interaction history.

11.title: Habits
11.description: Track your daily and weekly habits to build consistency and improve your personal routines.

12.title: Journalling
12.description: Reflect on your thoughts, log moods, and archive daily experiences for deeper self-awareness.

13.title: Archive
13.description: Clean up your workspace by moving completed or inactive items into a dedicated archive for future reference.

pricingSec.title: Choose Your Plan
pricingSec.description: Two options. Same mission: take full control of your life.

basic.label: Basic
basic.description: A simple start to organize your life with Second Brain.

advanced.label: Advanced
advanced.description: From chaos to clarity — organize your entire life in one system.

more-advanced.label: Ultimate
more-advanced.description: Manage your goals, tasks, habits — and your money, too. All in one place.

faqs.answer: Email me at contact@mostafayasser.com or DM me on Twitter anytime.
